head.title: A Quick Way To Decorate Cake

directions.step:
Date: Sun, 25 Feb 1996 22:41:09 -0500
From: "Vernon E. Phipps Jr." <cook4u@vivanet.com>
Melt marshmallows, add food coloring and vanilla. Add the cornflakes, stir until well coated. Spread this onto a cookie sheet, shaping into holly leaves. Place a red hot in middle. Let dry about 5 hours. Then top a white frosted angel cake with the holly leaves.
